snippet.title: Avant Guardian - Trailer
snippet.description: Avant Guardian is a top-down boss only game combining painting and combat. The game arena is a dynamic setting where colors you paint with affect both the player and boss alike.

localized.title: Avant Guardian - Trailer
localized.description: Avant Guardian is a top-down boss only game combining painting and combat. The game arena is a dynamic setting where colors you paint with affect both the player and boss alike.
